name: Luftrausers
description: requires lgogdownloader, don't forget to login first: lgogdownloader --login

execute.description: Extracting game data, it will take a while...

content:
exe: start.sh
files:
- unzip: http://lutris.net/files/tools/unzip.tar.gz
installer:
- execute:
    args: -c 'LD_PRELOAD='' LD_LIBRARY_PATH='' lgogdownloader --download --game luftrausers
      --platform lin --exclude e,p,l,c,d --directory $CACHE/installer'
    file: /bin/sh
    terminal: true
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $unzip
- execute:
    args: $CACHE/installer/luftrausers/gog_luftrausers*.sh -d $CACHE/installer data/noarch/*
    description: Extracting game data, it will take a while...
    file: $CACHE/unzip
- rename:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/installer/data/noarch
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/start.sh
